Name: ZIPPO REACTION
Explanation: A RESPONSE OR SET OF RESPONSES TO A SPECIFIC ANTI-SHIP MISSILE THREAT, EITHER PREDEFINED IN ATP-55 OR EXTAC 417, OR DEFINED ELSEWHERE FOR USE IN A PARTICULAR OPERATION. DOCTRINE RELATING TO THIS FUD IS NATO SECRET, SO CARE MUST BE TAKEN WITH ASSOCIATED EXPLANATIONS AND EXAMPLES TO AVOID ADATP-3 SECURITY MARKINGS HIGHER THAN NATO UNCLASSIFIED.

Name: ZIPPO REACTION CODE
Explanation: A CODE REPRESENTING A RESPONSE OR SET OF RESPONSES TO A SPECIFIC ANTI-SHIP MISSILE THREAT. DOCTRINE RELATING TO THIS FUD IS NATO SECRET, SO CARE MUST BE TAKEN WITH ASSOCIATED EXPLANATIONS AND EXAMPLES TO AVOID ADATP-3 SECURITY MARKINGS HIGHER THAN NATO UNCLASSIFIED.
